items.sentence: Tom told me he thought that he\'d win tomorrow.
I don\'t live in the same neighborhood anymore.
I don\'t think Tom would be willing to do that.
I don\'t think Tom would do this kind of thing.

Tom smiled at Mary, but she didn\'t smile back.
They don\'t sell these kinds of things anymore.
If Tom was angry before, he\'ll be furious now.
You\'re welcome to come with us if you want to.
You\'ve got my sunglasses and I want them back.
A bad cold has kept me from studying this week.
A fire broke out in my neighborhood last night.
A fire broke out in the supermarket last night.
I met him last week for the first time in ages.
What\'s so fun about taking pictures of trains?
I wish I could explain it better, but I can\'t.
If you wash it, your car will shine in the sun.
Let\'s eat out tonight. I\'m too tired to cook.
I wonder if there\'s a chance Tom will help us.
Women usually live 10 years longer than men do.
You need to learn not to ask so many questions.
Tom says he wants me to go to Boston with Mary.
Tom says he wants to ask me a lot of questions.
Why don\'t you get yourself something to drink?
Why don\'t you go out and get a drink with Tom?
Why don\'t you go watch TV while I cook dinner?
Tom took his coat off the hanger and put it on.
Tom took off his coat and hung it over a chair.
Tom tried to convince Mary to dye her hair red.
Tom tried to get Mary to come out of her shell.
Tom tried to impress Mary by driving very fast.
Tom thought that Mary was probably over thirty.
Tom thought that Mary would do the right thing.
I can\'t figure out the answer to this problem.
It was late at night when Tom finally got home.
Many inmates on death row say they want to die.
Many students travel to and from school by bus.

Please give me some advice on what I should do.
Please turn off the light before you go to bed.
I got a call about thirty minutes ago from Tom.
Tom is just as good a tennis player as Mary is.
Tom is looking forward to taking some time off.
Tom is more intelligent than Mary thinks he is.
Tom is not the same as he was thirty years ago.

Tom never has apologized for what he did to us.
Tom played Reveille on his bugle every morning.
